Have an informed conversation about cloud accounting
View this email in your browser
Cloud accounting is here – and like anything new, some small businesses have jumped in, some are skeptical about it and some are simply waiting for a reason to move. So who are these small businesses going to go to for guidance on what’s right for them. Yep, you! Framing the cloud conversation You know your clients, and we know cloud accounting, so we’ve put together this guide to help you have an informed conversation with your clients about moving their books online.
From the benefits of cloud accounting, to explaining common concerns, to questions to ask to determine a client’s readiness, this guide is a handy tool to assist you talk to your clients about upgrading to the cloud.
<< Download the guide
If we can help with your move to the cloud in any way, please call the team on 1800 618 521 who’ll be happy to assist.
Thanks!
QuickBooks Online ProAdvisor Team
